channel.title: I have a question
channel.description:
Can a neighborhood share from one wireless wifi connection? This is what this guy said that I was talking to.
My whole neighborhood shares 1 wireless wifi thing. I eat babies is a guy who lives 2 doors down from me.
He's pissing me off by spamming my forums and I'm not sure if I eat babies is the same guy I messaged and I don't want to ip ban someone that doesn't deserve it. Both the accounts use the same ip address. But then I got to thinking if I banned that ip, then I ban a whole neighborhood, which seems unlikely to me. So can neighborhoods do that or not?

item.title: I have a question
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Go to his house and light shit on fire and leave a note.
“Leave my forums alone or I will kidnap your whole family.”

Read full topic

item.title: I have a question
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Are house has one router.

1 computer is wired ther’s 4 other ports open.

2 other computers wireless
3 psp’s wireless
1 wii wireless
1 PS3 wireless
1 PS2 wireless

Read full topic

item.title: I have a question
item.dc:creator: @Statik97 Statik97
item.description:
@Statik97 wrote:

I would hate sharing wifi with anyone but my family or people I knew. Just buy your own router or modem and use it for yourself

Read full topic

item.title: I have a question
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

They only can share if its a laptop

Read full topic

item.title: I have a question
item.dc:creator: @wales_00 wales 00
item.description:
@wales_00 wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:3, topic:317612”]If it will save your forums from being spammed then it might be worth banning an entire neighborhood

That is, if there is absolutely no other way around it of course.[/quote]
But if you arn’t getting spammed, just keep banning him till he gets bored of registering, or you can put a hard security check on there, such as must have approval from e-mail notification.

Read full topic

item.title: I have a question
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

If it will save your forums from being spammed then it might be worth banning an entire neighborhood

That is, if there is absolutely no other way around it of course.

Read full topic

item.title: I have a question
item.dc:creator: @wales_00 wales 00
item.description:
@wales_00 wrote:

The internet connection must be slow. But if he is using the same IP connection then you would ban everyone including yourself from using your forums.

Read full topic
